plan_info.name: UHC Complete Care Support GS-1A (Regional PPO C-SNP)

Benefits & Costs.In-network: 0%-20% coinsuranceOut-of-net: Limits apply(Mental health services|Outpatient individual therapy visit)Advanced Plan Approval Required- A process through which the physician or other health care provider is required to obtain advance approval from the plan that payment will be made for a service or item furnished to an enrollee.
